title: Step 33

challengeFiles.name: index
styles

tests.text: You should add the position property of absolute to .background-buildings, .foreground-buildings.
You should add the top property of 0 to .background-buildings, .foreground-buildings.
You should use a comma to use both .foreground-buildings and .background-buildings selectors in the same style declaration.

description: You should optimize your code. Move the position and top properties and values from .foreground-buildings to .background-buildings. Then select both .background-buildings and .foreground-buildings there, effectively applying those styles to both of the elements. You can use a comma (,) to separate selectors like this: selector1, selector2.
